giftSuccess.title: congratulations!
giftSuccess.desc: You are eligible for the subsidy and receive INR50,000 from the Coronavirus Foundation The final step to receive.

resules.title: ***rules***
content: 1.You have to tell 5 groups or 20 friends to let more people know about our rescue plan and help them
2.After the sharing is completed, we will put the subsidy payment into your bank account

answerSuccess.title: Congratulations, you have passed the official WHO audit!

content: You have the opportunity to receive cash subsidies for the coronavirus disease outbreak in India

shareSuccess.title: Congratulations, you completed the goal sharing!
